message_1: Find the MD5 hash value of the message "Hello, world!" using the MD5 cryptographic hash function.
message_2:
To find the MD5 hash value of the message "Hello, world!", you can use an MD5 hash generator or a programming language with a built-in MD5 hashing function. Here's the MD5 hash value for the given message:

MD5("Hello, world!") = 6cd3556deb0da54bca060b4c39479839
